allData.occupation: Sheet Metal Mechanic at Matthew's Metals Products

positions.title: Sheet Metal Mechanic
positions.description:
•	Supervises, schedules, and prioritizes responsibilities for employees of N/C Production and Graining/Painting Departments.
•	Prepares monthly status reports detailing inventory usage, production deadlines, and shrinkage reports for Company owners and stock shareholders.
•	Maintains full inventory records including blue prints, purchase orders, and bidding documents for reference and audits.
•	Performs troubleshooting and scheduled maintenance and repair on shop equipment.
•	Utilizes and proficient in sheet metal software program, Metal Soft.
•	Orders materials according to job specification, including various types of metal, fasteners, tools and die equipment, paint and silkscreen materials as appropriate

positions.title: Business Partner
positions.description:
•	Managed and oversaw commercial remodels including office buildings, warehouse buildings, and residential apartments, as well as paving and asphalt installation and repair, framing, tile work, window installation, decking, fencing and flooring.
•	Conducted residential and commercial painting jobs while utilizing automated, air-less and conventional spray equipment.
•	Presided over the receiving of customer bid requests, made field checks and pre-inspections prior to city/county formal inspections, and prepared bid proposals on a wide variety of jobs
•	Employed extensive knowledge of small hand tools in the construction trade including mechanical and computerized equipment.

positions.title: POP Driver
positions.description:
•	Rotated and shelved product in retail stores on established route.
•	Maintained records of account of product displays and units shelved for route salesmen and faxed collected information to supervisor on a daily basis.
•	Monitored backroom stock and maintained proper rotation to ensure quality assurance.
•	Provided customer service and addressed needs as required by retail store management.

positions.title: Field Merchandiser
positions.description:
•	Marketed product, promoted product sales to retail businesses, and established working relationships with account managers.
•	Audited product turnover on a daily basis.
•	Managed merchandising of product displays and reset retail product tables as needed.
•	Handled processing of purchasing order requests and preparation of daily sales progress reports for submittal to corporate headquarters.
•	Rotated and shelved product in retail stores on established route.

positions.title: Co-Owner of Pepperidge Farm Franchise
positions.description:
•	Handled full charge sales, ordering and marketing product, and distribution of products.
•	Managed inventory control and warehouse stock rotation according to Pepperidge Farm guidelines and local government guidelines for food storage.
•	Prepared weekly sales reports, built independent accounts, posted daily sales and expenditures, recorded AP/AR, and posted monthly profit and law statements.
•	Owned and operated various types of warehouse equipment including forklifts, pallet jacks, hand trucks, and dollies.
•	Experienced in driving a variety of large trucks including delivery trucks, heavy duty pick-ups and transports.

certifications.name: CNC Sheet Metal Equipment Program Courses
